umx modeling package

Welcome to getting structural equation modeling done fast.

umx is an R package with one purpose: helping you get things done with Structural Equation Modeling using OpenMx. The design goals are to make SEM quicker and easier to implement, update, and publish.

There is a forum for Q&A-style discussion
